Charming 1 bedroom apartment in stunning land marked /tree lined block

Features a converted fireplace, exposed brick, vintage wood left unpainted, and recessed lighting for a charming amalgamation of modern aesthetic with a touch of old world charm

The Location: Located in the heart of Bedstuy, this unit is easily accessible via both the MTA A & C trains.
There is also a CitiBike station only one block away making your commute to and around Brooklyn a breeze.
Just steps away from both Fulton & Nostrand Avenues where you will find a wide array of shops, restaurants, cafes and bars for your shopping and dining convenience.
Few blocks from Herbert Von King Park

Clinton Hill is a historic neighborhood full of cultural influence mixed with new trendy restaurants, bars, cafes, parks, community gardens, organic stores, live music, city bikes as well as super fun fast food right at your fingertips. located in the center of it all commuting is super easy with all trains and public transportation around it
